description:
OVER 600 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS HAVE ALREADY TAKEN THIS COURSE

46 Premium Step by Step Instruction That Teaches You EVERYTHING You Need To Know About Using Joomla WITHOUT Coding

The GROWING Web Design Industry

The web design industry is in very high demand right now and will be that way for a very long time. Companies from all over the world have now realized that in order to to expand their business, they need a website.

Web Design Industry Statistics

  • Annualized growth within this industry for the last 5 years has been at 2.7% per year, culminating in a total global impact of $20 billion
  • There are estimated to be 200 million active websites on the internet right now.
  • 67.8% of websites still donâ€™t use any form of a web content management system at all.
  • 46% of American small businesses don't have a website
  • One of most popular form of web content management is powered by Joomla.

What This Means For You

Companies and businesses are always looking for web designers, especially those with CMS skills like Joomla. This means that you'll be in high demand and finding projects won't be difficult. In fact, you will even have companies fighting to hire you.

How Can I Help You Get Started?

  • I show you step by step instructions on how to use Joomla
  • No coding required
  • Watch my screen and follow along...it's that simple
  • As easy as editing a MS word document
  • 46 premium content
  • Hidden tips and secrets to save time and money

What Do I Do Next?

Signing up only takes a few seconds. Click "take this course" button, top right, now...start making money creating websites with Joomla.
title: The Fastest And Easiest Way To Learn Joomla 3 For Beginners
